page.title: 14Johnson Matthey Chemicals
page.content: Johnson Matthey started up in 1817, and came to Royston in 1957.It was in London before Royston but moved to Royston because they didn't have the Clean Air Act and they wanted to expand.They also came to Royston to employ more people.Johnson Matthey now employ about 900 people.They have cleaners,processors who purify the metal,security guards,chemists,and they have secretaries,carpenters and finally salesmen.Mr.Etheridge told us to hand around the ingot of 'gold' it weighed 1 kg.Its area was 60sq.cms.It said on it JR78223. They melt metals like alluminum,gold,silver,bronze, sodium,platinum,lead and tin.From the metals they make:- gold, plating, jewellery, china, cutlery, fillings for teeth, decorations, paint and they make electric rear windscreens,and exhaust filters.
